text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Today's mission — accomplished. 
Switching to normal routine.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Kris S. Don't you feel like
venturing outside pre-established
harmony?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: I have never thought about it.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Bring forth your ego. Listen to your
inner self, and do as your heart
desires.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I can't think of anything in particular. 
If I had to say; I am thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
That's right, obey that turbid 
current of emotions! Where does 
its ferocious flow lead you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Occasionally…… to carbonated water. 
I will head to the vending machine.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: That won't be enough to quench your soul! Yearn for everlasting joy instead of a moment of repose! Let us drink together, Einherjar!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Understood. I take it you… were also
thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaha! That's beside the point! 
Us sharing drinks is beyond the realm of 
epistemology! We shall do as we please!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Are you finished? 
Then let us go…… to the cafeteria.
